sentences.en: A section of the reading public has an insatiable appetite for dirty stories about the famous.
sentences.cn: 阅读大众中有一部分人对名人的风流韵事的欲望总是无法满足。

sentences.en: An insatiable taste for letters had thrown the young man into journalism.
sentences.cn: 对文学的强烈爱好使这位青年进入了新闻界.

sentences.en: He had an insatiable love for music.
He traces all the miseries and discontents of life to insatiable selfishness.
sentences.cn: 他把人生一切苦难和不满都归咎于不知足的自私.

sentences.en: He was dominated by an insatiable drive for fame.
sentences.cn: 他被一种难以满足的成名欲支配着.

sentences.en: His curiosity about the world was insatiable.
sentences.cn: 他对宇宙的好奇心是无止境的.

sentences.en: I love reading: I have an insatiable appetite for vicarious experience.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢读书,对于体验间接经历有一种不能满足的渴求.

sentences.en: Nature has instilled in our minds an insatiable desire to see truth.
sentences.cn: 自然给我们心灵注入了永无休止的发现真理的欲望.

sentences.en: Our attitude towards ourselves should be " to be insatiable in learning " and towards others " to be tireless in teaching ".
sentences.cn: 对自己, “ 学而不厌 ” ,对人家, “ 诲人不倦 ”,我们应取这种态度.

sentences.en: Overnight she developed an insatiable appetite, and began to gain weight.
sentences.cn: 她突然间显出了一种永不满足的食欲, 而且体重开始增加了.

sentences.en: That politician is insatiable for power.
sentences.cn: 那个政客对权力贪得无厌.

sentences.en: The public has an insatiable appetite for stories about the famous.
sentences.cn: 公众对名人有着难以满足的好奇心。

sentences.en: There is no question that this man's lust for power was insatiable.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,此人对权力的欲望是贪得无厌的.
他们是贪得无厌的征税员。

words.tran_cn: 贪得无厌地；无法满足地

trans.tran_cn: 无法满足的，贪得无厌的，不知足
trans.tran_en: always wanting more and more of something
